pkgmetadata.longdescription: Weighted BACON Algorithms // The BACON algorithms are methods for multivariate outlier nomination (detection) and robust linear regression by Billor, Hadi, and Velleman (2000) doi:10.1016/S0167-9473(99)00101-2. The extension to weighted problems is due to Beguin and Hulliger (2008) https://www150.st atcan.gc.ca/n1/en/catalogue/12-001-X200800110616; see also doi:10.21105/joss.03238.
